lead_paragraph: The Islanders have signed the veteran wing Chris Simon to a one-year deal worth $1 million. Simon had 8 goals and 14 assists in 72 games with the Calgary Flames last season.
snippet: The Islanders have signed the veteran wing Chris Simon to a one-year deal worth $1 million. Simon had 8 goals and 14 assists in 72 games with the Calgary Flames last season.
